short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ARK Connect is an open source browser extension that allows users to connect their ARK address to Web3 applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ARK Connect offers a user-friendly dashboard where users can check their balance, local currency value, and access various features. With support for multiple addresses, Ledger devices, passphrase imports, and customization options via the settings page, ARK Connect provides a versatile and secure platform for users to interact with the ARK Ecosystem. Dark theme enthusiasts can also enjoy a visually appealing experience by activating the 'Dark Mode' feature. Experience the future of blockchain interaction with ARK Connect.
